text: No one ever imagined we would make it this far.
♪ I guess all the mountains that I moved just weren't enough ♪
♪ And all those nights I walked you home ♪

Incision-less surgeries, 4D imaging,
mechanical organs, stem cell therapy...
♪ And I just wonder what it'd take to make you stay ♪
♪ 'Cause when you said jump, I said how high ♪
♪ But when I jumped, you said goodbye ♪
Every medical innovation seemed impossible,
unimaginable until it was achieved.
♪ I would've walked through hell ♪
And luckily, we haven't stopped making advancements.
Your recent COVID test has come back negative,
your ABG's improved,
your RSBI looks promising,
and oxygen requirements have decreased.
If you keep this up,
I may just try weaning you off the vent later today.
Because the other side of the unimaginable
is death.
And the pain that comes with loss.

no signs of head trauma, but I did order a pan scan.

You're right here, and I can't...

You were always good at that.

like, um...
